text: allah ye atmalanu (pranalanu) marana kalamuna vasaparacukunevadu mariyu maranincani vadi (atmalanu) nidravasthalo (vasaparacukune vadunu). Taruvata denikaite maranam nirnayimpa badutundo danini apukoni, migata vari (atmalanu) oka niyamita kalam varaku tirigi pamputadu. Niscayanga indulo alocince variki goppa sucanalu (ayat) unnayi
